hero.headline: Member Portal & Mobile App
hero.description: Manage your health sharing account, access virtual care, and track your medical expenses all in one place. Available 24/7 on web and mobile.

appServices.title: Everything You Need in One App
appServices.description: Our member portal and mobile app put comprehensive healthcare management at your fingertips. Submit expenses, access care, and stay connected with your health sharing community.

features.title: Submit Sharing Requests
features.description: Easily upload medical bills and receipts using your phone's camera. Track the status of your submissions in real-time.

features.title: Virtual Care Access
features.description: Connect with licensed physicians 24/7 for non-emergency medical consultations, prescriptions, and follow-up care.

features.title: View Sharing History
features.description: Access your complete sharing history, including submitted expenses, shared amounts, and payment details.

features.title: Manage Payments
features.description: View and update your monthly sharing amount, payment methods, and billing preferences. Set up autopay for convenience.

features.title: Update Profile
features.description: Keep your personal information, emergency contacts, and medical history up to date with our secure platform.

features.title: Real-time Notifications
features.description: Get instant updates on sharing request status, payment confirmations, and important account information.

features.title: Find Providers
features.description: Locate nearby healthcare providers, urgent care centers, and pharmacies with integrated maps and directions.

features.title: Prescription Discounts
features.description: Access exclusive prescription drug discounts and find the lowest prices at pharmacies near you.

features.title: Appointment Scheduling
features.description: Book virtual care appointments and manage your healthcare calendar directly from the app.
